casebody.data:
Leavitt
v.
Hargrove 268P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Owen D. Leavitt, for Leavitt, Owen Deshawn. Paul J. Stainback, Attorney at Law, Henderson, for Hargrove, Willie.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of September 2016 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
